pageexchange-logdesc: This is the log of actions related to the Page Exchange extension.
pageexchange-installed: A section header for packages that have been installed on the wiki
pageexchange-available:
A section header for packages that are available to be installed on the wiki
{{identical|Available}}
pageexchange-installpackage:
An edit summary. Parameters:
* $1 - the name of a "package" of wiki pages
pageexchange-updatepackage:
An edit summary. Parameters:
* $1 - the name of a "package" of wiki pages
pageexchange-uninstallpackage:
An edit summary. Parameters:
* $1 - the name of a "package" of wiki pages
pageexchange-installpackagelog:
A log action description. The first parameter is ignored. Parameters:
* $2 - the name of a "package" of wiki pages
* $3 - the name of the creator of this package
pageexchange-updatepackagelog:
A log action description. The first parameter is ignored. Parameters:
* $2 - the name of a "package" of wiki pages
* $3 - the name of the creator of this package
pageexchange-uninstallpackagelog:
A log action description. The first parameter is ignored. Parameters:
* $2 - the name of a "package" of wiki pages
* $3 - the name of the creator of this package
pageexchange-package-requiredextensions: A label for the list of MediaWiki extensions required for this package to work
pageexchange-package-requiredpackages: A label for the list of wiki page "packages" that must be installed for the current package to work
pageexchange-package-morerecent: An info message about a "package" of wiki pages that has been installed on this wiki
pageexchange-pagehaschanged: An info message, displayed right after the name of the page
pageexchange-latestvalue:
A message that says what the most recent value is for an attribute whose value can change at any time. Parameters:
* $1 - the most recent value
pageexchange-uninstallablepackage: The header of a warning message
